parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return.

parameter.name: excludeFields
parameter.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude.

parameter.name: count
parameter.description: The number of records to return.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.description: The number of records from a collection to skip.

parameter.name: beforeCampaignLastSent
parameter.description: The lists created before the last campaign send date.

parameter.name: sinceCampaignLastSent
parameter.description: The lists created after the last campaign send date.

parameter.name: beforeDateCreated
parameter.description: The lists created before the set date.

parameter.name: sinceDateCreated
parameter.description: The lists created after the set date.
